Package logic.entities

Class Entity

java.lang.Object
logic.entities.BaseEntity
logic.entities.Entity
All Implemented Interfaces:
Identifiable, Positionable
Direct Known Subclasses:
Enemy, Fruit, IceBlock, IceCream, IndestructibleBlock
public class Entity extends BaseEntity
Provides methods to manage the movement and collision logic of an entity in a game

    canMove(int x, int y, ArrayList<Entity> entities)
    the function goes through the list of entities and if the x and y coordinates are equal to the coordinate it returns false and cannot move, otherwise if it is not in the same coordinates it returns the function withinBounds (x,y), which indicates that it can move.

      Returns:
      a true or false value depending on the position of the class

    • canMove

      protected boolean canMove(int x, int y, ArrayList<Entity> entities)
      the function goes through the list of entities and if the x and y coordinates are equal to the coordinate it returns false and cannot move, otherwise if it is not in the same coordinates it returns the function withinBounds (x,y), which indicates that it can move.
      Parameters:
      x - position on x-axis
      y - position on y-axis
      entities - a grouping or an entities array
      Returns:
      a false or true variable depending on whether the entity is in the given coordinates.
